content.title: Chapter 1
content.subtitle: Foundational Concepts Of Energy Data And Its Role In Sustainability And Equity
content.body: Thank you for joining us for the first chapter of the Data in Sustainable Energy Module. We invite you to interact with the closing scenario, and to reflect on how you can take action to move these ideas from ambitions into action.

nextBlock.title: Title of the scenario
nextBlock.cta: You have a meeting with the minister of energy to discuss data-driven policy. Are you ready?

content.title: Key Concepts
content.intro: Explore foundational ideas from this lesson.
